verses.name: Jeremiah 51:43
verses.text: Her cities are a desolation, a dry land, and a wilderness, a land wherein no man dwelleth, neither doth any son of man pass thereby.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:44
verses.text: And I will punish Bel in Babylon, and I will bring forth out of his mouth that which he hath swallowed up: and the nations shall not flow together any more unto him: yea, the wall of Babylon shall fall.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:45
verses.text: My people, go ye out of the midst of her, and deliver ye every man his soul from the fierce anger of the Lord.
